description.value:
Activate 1 (manipulate)

Though it contains but a tiny drop of Gorum's blood, drinking this thick, swirling potion fills the user with divine wrath and resilience. While under the effect of the potion, you gain a +2 status bonus to physical damage rolls for 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.Effect: Crimson Godsblood Serum]

The first time during that minute you're reduced to 0 Hit Points but not immediately killed, you avoid being knocked out, regain @Damage[(2d8+5)[healing]] Hit Points, and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Confused] for 1 round, and your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Wounded] condition increases by 1.
